pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robotframework-Openpyxllib libraryThis Robotframework Openpyxl library that provides keywords to Open, Read, Write and Save XLSX files. This library uses Openpyxl python module to read and write datas in xlsx files.Pre-requisities:- Python - 2.7 (Not tested with Python 3.0)- Robotframework - 3.0.2 (Not tested with other versions)- OpenpyxlInstallation:pip install robotframework-openpyxllibExample:| Library | OpenPyxlLibrary || Open Excel | <Filename with path> |
